titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1655) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 2000 and 2001 for the civilian energy and scientific research, development, and demonstration and related commercial application of energy technology programs, projects, and activities of the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1655 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-317, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 109.

action.text: The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/14/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 1655 (Department of Energy authorization).
